ch.aplu.android
Interface GGTouchListener

public interface GGTouchListener

Declarations of the notification method called by touch events.

Method Summary
 boolean touchEvent(GGTouch touch)
          Event callback method called when a screen touch event occurs.
 

Method Detail

touchEvent

boolean touchEvent(GGTouch touch)
Event callback method called when a screen touch event occurs. The parameter is used to get the type of the touch event and the current touch position.

Parameters:
touch - the touch reference to get to get information about the event
Returns:
true, if the event is consumed, so following listeners in the GGTouchListener sequence will not get the event
